description: Number of "labeled" cyclic subgroups of alternating group A_n.
formula: a(n) = 1/2*Sum_{pi} (1+(-1)^(k_2+k_4+...)) * n!/(k_1!*1^k_1*k_2!*2^k_2*...*k_n!*n^k_n*phi(lcm{i:k_i != 0})), where pi runs through all partitions k_1+2*k_2+...+n*k_n=n and phi is Euler's function.
mathematica: f[list_] :=Total[list]!/(Apply[Times, list]*Apply[Times, Map[Length, Split[list]]!])/EulerPhi[Apply[LCM, list]]; Table[Total[Map[f,   Select[IntegerPartitions[n],EvenQ[Length[Select[#, EvenQ[#] &]]] &]]], {n, 1, 21}] (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Oct 03 2015 *)
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_
